text: An election to Leitrim County Council took place on 27 June 1991 as part of that year's Irish local elections. 22 councillors were elected from four electoral divisions by PR-STV voting for a five-year term of office. ==Results by party== {| class=wikitable ! colspan=2 align=center|Party ! valign=top|Seats ! valign=top|± ! valign=top|First Pref. votes ! valign=top|FPv% ! valign=top|±% |- | align=right|9 | align=right|-1 | align=right|6,735 | align=right|43.35 | align=right| |- | align=right|9 | align=right|+1 | align=right|5,481 | align=right|35.28% | align=right| |- | align=right|1 | align=right|-1 | align=right|1,398 | align=right|9% | align=right| |- | align=right|1 | align=right|- | align=right|402 | align=right|2.6% | align=right| |- | align=right|2 | align=right|+1 | align=right|1,485 | align=right|9.6% | align=right| |- | colspan=2 align=center|Totals | align=right |22 | align=center|- | align=right |15,535 | align=center|100% | align=center|— |} ==Results by Electoral Area== ===Ballinamore=== ===Carrick-on-Shannon=== ===Dromahaire=== ===Manorhamilton=== ==External links== * Official website * Irishelectionliterature Category:1991 Irish local elections 1991
title: 1991 Leitrim County Council election
